item.title: Cleanup
item.description: It was about time. I created this website back in 2017 when I was fresh out of university. I published a few posts, but most of them were too academical, badly written, and not very interesting to be honest. I decided that it was time for a clean-up. I don't know whether I will ever publish anything here.
